title: Badrutt's Palace appoints new Executive Chef
text:
Badrutt's Palace appoints new Executive Chef Badrutt's Palace appoints new Executive Chef Details Category: Switzerland   15:15 Badrutt’s Palace has announced the appointment of their new Executive Chef, Michel Jost, set to join the team in October 2015. With a passion for creating exciting taste adventures, Geneva born Jost brings with him a wealth of international culinary experience, having worked in South Africa, Israel, Greece and the UAE. 
Jost’s previous positions have seen him spearhead, plan and implement large-scale events, including the Formula One in Abu Dhabi and the World Economic Forum (WEF) in 2013. In addition, he has supervised a variety of international restaurants, helping them gain global recognition for their outstanding Asian and International cuisine, resulting in numerous nominations and awards from both the media and trade. “It didn’t take long for the unique atmosphere of Badrutt’s Palace Hotel and the strong team behind the hotel to convince me that I wanted to become part of the Palace family. As Executive Chef, I am looking forward to delivering the finest quality cuisine to further the special guest experience, which Badrutt’s Palace is famous for,” Jost comments. “Through the creation of culinary delights, my team and aim to create the opportunity for guests to pause, savour and escape the fast pace of today’s society.” Related articles
